Room.Name: Arioch & Arcana's Suite
Room.ShortDescription: You see a luxurious Ashton Falls suite room before you.
Room.LongDescription: This spacious suite is furnished with modern designer pieces. A few priceless oil paintings casually spaced along the walls produce an effect which shows affluent, yet stylish tastes. To one side of the room, a full-featured entertainment center equiped with the latest in stereo / wide-screen television technology has been set up for convenience, while to the other side, a crystal table for two stands ready for those romantic candle-light dinners.
